name: Sir Stretchalot - The Plight of the Elves
name_original: Sir Stretchalot - The Plight of the Elves
description:
After a sensual moaning leads our hero to a sharp-eared hottie with a tight ass that promises immortality, Sir Stretchalot quickly finds himself caught up in a brand new adventure full of ruffians to flog, hotties to stretch, and panties to collect!

LIVE TO STRETCH AND STRETCH TO LIVE!

  • Three unique hotties to stretch!
  • Sizzling hot hand-drawn lewds!
  • Animated sex scenes!
  • Over 60k words of riveting dialog!
  • Galleries where you can view unlocked lewd images as well as re-live Stretching Sessions!
  • Easy to use turn-based combat system!

NO PRIOR STRETCHING EXPERIENCE NECESSARY!

You don't need to play the first Sir Stretchalot game, " The Wenches in the Well", but it does serve as something of an introduction to Sir Stretchalot and this series. If you're interested, you can find that game here on Steam as well:


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1273110/Sir_Stretchalot__The_Wenches_in_the_Well/
